SEARCH
Package gw.api.observability

Class ObservabilityLogger

java.lang.Object
gw.api.observability.ObservabilityLogger
public class ObservabilityLogger extends Object
Reports start and endings of business events. This is particularly suited for monitoring applications for cloud usages.

    • logStart

      Logs a start message with message parameters. See logStart(Marker, ObservabilityContext).
      Parameters:
      marker - The Marker.
      logMessageParams - The LogMessageParams.
      Returns:
      true if a start message has been logged, false otherwise.

    • logStart

      public boolean logStart(org.slf4j.Marker marker, ObservabilityContext context)
      Logs a start message with message parameters. If a previous start time for the marker is found, no start message is logged. If the passed in ObservabilityContext contains a start time, the start times storage is not used at all. Instead, the user is expected to pass the same start time into the relevant logStop(org.slf4j.Marker) or logFail(org.slf4j.Marker, java.lang.String) call.
      Parameters:
      marker - The Marker.
      context - The ObservabilityContext.
      Returns:
      true if a start message has been logged, false otherwise.

    • logStop

      public ElapsedTime logStop(org.slf4j.Marker marker)
      Logs a completed message with elapsed time. See logStop(Marker, ObservabilityContext).
      Parameters:
      marker - The Marker.
      Returns:
      ElapsedTime if a completed message has been logged, null otherwise.

      Logs a completed message with elapsed time and the given message parameters. See logStop(Marker, ObservabilityContext).
      Parameters:

      logMessageParams - The LogMessageParams.
      Returns:

    • logStop

      public ElapsedTime logStop(org.slf4j.Marker marker, ObservabilityContext context)
      Logs a completed message with elapsed time and the given context. No completed message is logged if start time for the marker is not found, unless the context contains a start time (using ObservabilityContext.withStartTime(java.lang.Long, java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit)), in which case we assume the same start time has been passed into logStart(org.slf4j.Marker) and do not check the start times storage at all.
      Parameters:
      marker - The Marker.
      context - The ObservabilityContext.
      Returns:
      ElapsedTime if a completed message is logged, null otherwise.

    • logFail

      public ElapsedTime logFail(org.slf4j.Marker marker, String message)
      Logs a failed message with elapsed time. See logFail(Marker, ObservabilityContext).
      Parameters:
      marker - The Marker.
      message - The failure message.
      Returns:
      ElapsedTime if a fail message has been logged, null otherwise.

    • logFail

      public ElapsedTime logFail(org.slf4j.Marker marker, String message, LogMessageParams logMessageParams)
      Logs a failed message with elapsed time and message parameters. See logFail(Marker, ObservabilityContext).
      Parameters:
      marker - The Marker.
      message - The failure message.
      logMessageParams - The LogMessageParams.
      Returns:
      ElapsedTime if a fail message has been logged, null otherwise.

    • logFail

      public ElapsedTime logFail(org.slf4j.Marker marker, ObservabilityContext context)
      Logs a failed message with elapsed time and the given context. No failed message is logged if start time for the marker is not found, unless the context contains a start time. See details here: logStop(Marker, ObservabilityContext).
      Parameters:
      marker - The Marker.
      context - The ObservabilityContext.
      Returns:
      ElapsedTime if a fail message has been logged, null otherwise.

    • logError

      public boolean logError(org.slf4j.Marker marker, String message, Throwable throwable)
      Logs an error message. See logError(Marker, Throwable, ObservabilityContext).
      Parameters:
      marker - The Marker.
      message - The error message.
      throwable - The Throwable.
      Returns:
      true

    • logError

      public boolean logError(org.slf4j.Marker marker, String message, Throwable throwable, LogMessageParams logMessageParams)
      Logs an error message with message parameters. See logError(Marker, Throwable, ObservabilityContext).
      Parameters:
      marker - The Marker.
      message - The error message.
      throwable - The Throwable.
      logMessageParams - The LogMessageParams.
      Returns:
      true

    • logError

      public boolean logError(org.slf4j.Marker marker, Throwable throwable, ObservabilityContext context)
      Logs an error message with the given context. Clears the start time storage for this marker on this thread with the assumption that, if it existed, we were going to use it for a logStop(org.slf4j.Marker) or logFail(org.slf4j.Marker, java.lang.String) call. However, an error denotes the unexpected end of a process, and therefore we do not expect either call to occur.
      Parameters:
      marker - The Marker.
      throwable - The Throwable.
      context - The ObservabilityContext.
      Returns:
      true
